summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing the scheduling of a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team. Lesley Groff is coordinating the meeting times with Amanda Kirby and Paul Morns, indicating Epstein's return to New York City and the management of his accounts.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in setting up the meeting with Epstein and is communicating with Lesley Groff about his availability.

persons.name: Paul Morns
persons.context: Paul Morns is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team that will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled with the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is mentioned as having communicated with Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting together regarding Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is involved in setting up a meeting for her client, Jeffrey Epstein.
Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting that involves Paul Morns from the Deutsche Bank team.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting Scheduling
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled with Jeffrey Epstein for the week of October 8.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.
Amanda Kirby is involved in the communication regarding Epstein's meeting.
The meeting is proposed for October 7 or 8, 2013.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for the meeting.
The document contains confidential information as indicated in the email.
